parse.title: List of research laboratories for machine translation

text.*:
The following is a list of research laboratories that focus on machine translation.

List[edit]

This article is incomplete. Please help to improve it, or discuss the issue on the talk page. (March 2017)
Parent Organization Research Laboratory Type Headquarters Ref.
